alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 10:03AM CST until December 02 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The combination of falling snow and strong winds will result in reductions in visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
